scenes.background: You decided to help with the urgent task as you are on annual leave. [Monica] and [Bob] join the conversation.
scenes.description: 'It’s great you’re helping, but don’t you think it’s unfair on your break?' She tilts her head, looking concerned.

options.text: I see what you mean, but I think we can manage this together.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by acknowledging her point, but your motivation to address the urgency could be higher.

options.text: I get it, but we all have to make sacrifices sometimes.
options.analysis: You maintain emotional control and motivation, but empathy and social skill could be enhanced.

options.text: Maybe, but I think we can handle this if we focus.
options.analysis: You show good emotional regulation and empathy, but emotional perception could be better.
